Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 33 points and had 9 assists and 8 rebounds in the game against the Minnesota Timberwolves
The Celtics struggled with offensive fundamentals in their loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder, making only 8 shots in the second half and missing 21 of 24 three-point attempts
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kristaps Porzingis had a standout performance against the Denver Nuggets, scoring 25 points and grabbing 10 rebounds
In their G League matchup, Baylor Scheierman led the Maine Celtics with 23 points, while Ron Harper Jr. and Jay Scrubb contributed significantly off the bench
Others: The Celtics' victory against the Timberwolves marked the beginning of a four-game road trip, providing a much-needed boost after struggling with an 8-6 record in December
